thread.title: Mr. Chris A. Paul Joins Growing Denver-Based Berkana Resources Corporation as a Senior Consultant

author: cnbc.com
title: Mr. Chris A. Paul Joins Growing Denver-Based Berkana Resources Corporation as a Senior Consultant

organizations.name: berkana resources corporation - berkana resources corporation
general counsel of blueknight energy partners

text:
DENVER--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Berkana Resources Corporation, a leading provider of OT and IT System Integration, Security, Compliance and Consulting, is pleased to announce that Mr. Chris Paul has joined us as a Senior Consultant. Berkana is proud to welcome Mr. Paul, a seasoned professional with over 35 years of experience.
Previous to joining Berkana, Chris served as General Counsel of Gulf Oil LP, and previously worked as General Counsel of Blueknight Energy Partners. Prior to these positions he worked in private law practice for 16 years, and for Sunoco in legal and business positions for 7 years. He started his career with four years of criminal law experience in the United States Army and as a Special Assistant US Attorney.
“We are pleased to be working with Chris. His deep industry knowledge adds considerable expertise to our capabilities,” said Jeff Whitney of Berkana Resources.
For additional information about Berkana Resources, contact Jeff Whitney or visit our website at www.berkanaresources.com .
ABOUT Berkana Resources Corporation - Berkana Resources Corporation (BRC) provides Operational and Information Technology consulting, integration, security and compliance solutions to customers in the Oil & Gas and Electric Utilities markets. Our clients include major Oil & Gas Companies, Utility Companies and Mid-Stream MLP's.
